title: Calories in Papa John's Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in Papa John's pizza per slice, including macros like carbs, protein, fat, and sodium, with basis details and variations for different toppings.
assumptions: Medium original crust cheese pizza, 1 slice (1/8 pizza, ~100 g); no extra toppings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, crust type, toppings, and preparation. Values based on standard Papa John's data; check their site or app for exacts.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Papa John's medium cheese pizza provides ~220 kcal and ~9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Papa John's pizza?
faqs.a: About 220 kcal for a medium cheese slice on original crust.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Papa John's pizza?
faqs.a: One slice has ~26 g carbs, mostly from the crust.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Papa John's pizza?
faqs.a: Around 570 mg per medium cheese slice due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: Calories in Papa John's pizza with toppings?
faqs.a: Base cheese is 220 kcal; add 40-100 kcal for common toppings like pepperoni or veggies.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in Papa John's pizza?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”thin crust saves ~30 kcal per slice vs. original; gluten-free may vary.
